definition: to reconstruct/to repair/to revamp/to revise/to retake a failed course
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
to make friends again/to renew old cordial relations

sentences.english: Or the time I sent that late night email to my ex-girlfriend that we should get back together.
sentences.chinese: 或者我在深夜給前女友發郵件，希望我們能重修舊好。

sentences.english: And then you actually go on a bit of a tour around the reconstructed Globe Theatre.
sentences.chinese: 然後，你可以繼續參觀重修後的環球劇院。

sentences.english: However, the re-equipping was done in the spirit of the original ascent.
sentences.chinese: 當然，重修線路是在原始攀登的精神下進行的。

sentences.english: At the end of the Qing Dynasty, led to Wang Yuchang once again renovated garden.
sentences.chinese: 清末，以王愈昌爲首再次重修花園。

sentences.english: Now, the cultural-relic department determines to repair the Buddha and recondition its vicinity.
sentences.chinese: 文物部門決定重修大佛，重整大佛及周邊環境。

sentences.english: I still have to fill 16 hours in my major.
sentences.chinese: 我必須重修主修科目16小時。

sentences.english: Through repair work or the preparation of literature books, play down the sense of Han nationality.
sentences.chinese: 通過重修或編寫文獻典籍，淡化漢民族意識。

sentences.english: Suzi is now re-taking GCSE English and plans to go to college.
sentences.chinese: 目前，蘇茜正在重修英國普通中等英語，打算上大學。

sentences.english: We give to alleviate guilt and repair our self-image.
sentences.chinese: 爲了減輕罪惡感和重修自我形象而付出。

sentences.english: Was Sam really going to ditch the bar to move to L.A. with the reemerged Diane?
sentences.chinese: 山姆真的離開酒店去了洛杉磯和戴安重修舊好了嗎？

sentences.english: Keuka China Programs policies governing the comprehensive grade replacement exam and repeating a course will apply.
sentences.chinese: 補考將按庫克中國項目補考和重修政策執行。

sentences.english: Maybe I should get back together with Naomi.
sentences.chinese: 也許我該回去和娜歐蜜重修舊好。

sentences.english: During Qing Emperor QianLong's reign it was reconstructed again in 1751.
sentences.chinese: 在1751年清朝乾隆年間又再次重修了。

sentences.english: We must have the roof redone.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須把屋頂重修一下。

sentences.english: She would not even wish for any renewal of his attentions.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至根本不希望他再來重修舊好。

sentences.english: Rebuilding to also preferably re- fabricate one again is extra labor-saving, this is also the empress words.
sentences.chinese: 重修也不如再重新建造一個更爲省力，這也是後話了。

definition: a record of events inscribed on a tablet
(of a monk) to beg for food
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
temple to Kuixing, Daoist God of fate
